title: Ala Kahakai National Historic Trail: Planning
body: Planning           Click here for the Final Comprehensive Management Plan for the Ala Kahakai National Historic Trail.   COMPREHENSIVE MANAGEMENT PLAN The Final Comprehensive Management Plan (CMP) for the Ala Kahakai National Historic Trail is now available. The CMP, released in May 2009, establishes management guidelines needed to fulfill the preservation and public use goals. A consoliation of community input gathered at island wide public meetings resulted in this final document. The approved plan was documented in a Record of Decision which serves as the official approval of the selected management alternative. Please let us know if you would like to receive a copy of the approved Comprehensive Management Plan. The approved plan includes only the selected alternative. A limited supply is available through the Ala Kahakai National Historic Trail office. You may contact us by phone (808) 326-6012 x-101 (Aric Arakaki) or x-102 (Rick Gmirkin) or x-104 (Ida Hanohano) or by mail: Ala Kahakai National Historic Trail 73-4786 Kanalani Street, #14 Kailua-Kona, HI 96740
